long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Note is a simple, easy-to-use browser extension for taking and saving notes directly in your browser. Perfect for quick reminders and jotting down ideas without leaving your current tab.

How it works:
1. Click the extension icon to open the popup.
2. Type your notes in the provided text area.
3. Click "Save" to store the note. Your notes will persist in the text area across browser sessions.
4. To clear, delete notes and save.
